resources.string: Cerberus SMS need to be your default SMS application to eliminate unwanted incoming messages:

About application

 What does it do? 

 This application was created to help you identify easily and quickly what mobile operator (CooTel, Claro, Movistar) belongs to a number of cellular.
 This objective can be achieved in different ways: 

 1- Manually type the phone number on the application.
 2- Will show your contact list identifying the operator that owns each of their phone numbers.
 3- Identifies the operator that owns each of the phone numbers in your call log.
 4- Identifies the operator that owns each of the phone numbers in your inbox.
 5- The operator identifies incoming and outgoing calls in real time.

 Other functions:s

 6- Identifies these country codes such as USA, Latin countries and some European
 7- Department identifies it belongs to a conventional number (in Nicaragua only)


Security policy 

 The application requires synchronized with your list of contacts, inbox and call log to show a list of each of the aforementioned where identified effortlessly operator belongs to each number found. 


The data used by the application, phone numbers specifically, are only for internal use by the application.
Enter at least 3 digits to make call.
The application needs permission to display a window that is drawn above all others when making or receiving a call, this window will show the operator the number with which you will communicate.
The application requires permission to synchronize with your call log. This information is only for internal use by the application. If you agree press OK.
The application requires read your contacts to sync with your phonebook, this information is only for internal use by the application.
Identifies the operator that owns a cell in Nicaragua easily with this app.
Enter at least 3 digits to try to send the SMS
The application requires permission to read your SMS, this information is for internal use only application.
Recognize the operator to which each of the telephone numbers belongs in your call log.
It will show your contact list identifying the operator to which each of your telephone numbers belongs.
Use the dialer to manually enter the phone number and find out your carrier.
Identify the operator to which each phone number belongs in your inbox.
Time in calls received by operator
Time on outgoing calls per operator
The application and phone call records will be deleted, do you want to continue?
Error occured while trying to delete records
You do not have the necessary permissions to execute the action
In order to block SMS from unwanted numbers, set Verify Operator Nic as your default SMS application.
The application and phone message logs will be deleted, do you want to continue?
You can only perform this action if Check Operator is your SMS application by default
